settingAlias.label: string - required - user friendly
settingAlias.type: string required - must be either string, text, boolean, radio, checklist, dropdown
settingAlias.value: string|boolean|array - optional - string for string, text and radio | boolean for boolean settings | array for checklist and dropdown settings - must match a preValue item value for checklist, radio and dropdown

preValues.label: string - required - user friendly
preValues.value: string - required - value to be used by code

settingAlias.validationPattern: string - optional - must be a valid Javascript regex pattern
settingAlias.multiple: boolean - optional - only used by dropdown setting
